channel.title: RuneScape Pre Eoc Remake [742/742]
channel.description:
[center][CENTER][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/141kqy1.png[/img]
[B]Details [/B] Framework: Matrix | Hyperion | RSE Protocol: 742/742 [B] Developers[/B] Fuzen Seth
[B]Goals[/B] We achieve to create best emulation possible, we are emulating the PRE-EOC time.
[B]Media[/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/8xFMD.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8xFU3.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8xGbJ.jpg[/img] I will add more media this has been just started so i'm working on the unique content right now.
Today started -Daily challenges -Solomon's Store -Full loyalty points system -Featured content
[b]Updates[/b] [B]Added RS Polypore staff[/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/8Es7I.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8Es8O.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8EsfI.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8Esxv.jpg[/img]
When you click a npc from distance it's a actual target
[img]http://puu.sh/8EsE2.jpg[/img]
I did also a lot of bug fixing but the deob needs shitload of work more.
Polypore staf can be now recharged. [img]http://puu.sh/8Ev6U.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8Ev7P.jpg[/img]
[I]Please notice that this thread is still in progress.[/I][/CENTER][/center]

item.title: RuneScape Pre Eoc Remake [742/742]
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

Nearly finished the co-op slayer.




I did also some improvements to combat.

Edit: Puropuro nearly done.


Added full fountain of heroes.

Added full global ground items.

Added dragonfire shield and wilderness spawns.

Started the Solomon store but this will take some time to finish.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Pre Eoc Remake [742/742]
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:4, topic:542938”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=661815.msg4423786#msg4423786 date=1399747746]

why not work on 500-637 instead? I personally still didn’t like this era because of the armor graphics update.

;;switchitemslook?
[/quote]

I still feel like it isn’t authentic. Also, isn’t the game frame different as well?[/quote]

Yea, just a little though.

I only like this revision because it has a good amount of content in it, while still having old combat.

Read full topic

[B]Goals[/B]
We achieve to create best emulation possible, we are emulating the PRE-EOC time.

Today started
-Daily challenges
-Solomon’s Store
-Full loyalty points system
-Featured content

Updates

When you click a npc from distance it’s a actual target

I did also a lot of bug fixing but the deob needs shitload of work more.
